name: Skeet Mania
description:
Description:
• Skeet Mania is a fun little game, which you have a shootgun and need to shoot 35 targets in order to increase the score and be the best! You have only 60 seconds! So good luck! Press SPACEBAR key to shoot. Pause game with "P" key, press "M" key to return to the main menu screen.

Instructions:
Shoot the flying targets in 60 seconds!
Press SPACEBAR key to shoot. Pause game with 'P' key, press 'M' key to return to the main menu screen.

Game Dimensions: 640x430

Game Category: Action, Shooting, Sports, Other

Movement: Not Available
Fire / Action: Left Mouse Button
Jump: Not Available
